articles.title: Mbappe misses penalty as France exit Euro 2020, Sommer time in Switzerland - The Indian Express
articles.description: France is out of the European Championship, and it was Kylian Mbappe that missed the penalty kick in the shootout. Switzerland fill face Spain in the next round.
articles.content:
